name: Connected Beat
description:
Play Connected Beat

Help restore music back into the world of Connected Beat!

Connect things, destroy things, solve puzzles and enjoy the scenery while playing through this epic adventure.

Connected Beat is a rhytm, puzzle, rail shooting adventure created for the Lost Relic Game Jam.

A game by kiltec

Control Scheme

Keyboard:

  • Tab - Menu
  • Q - Quit
  • R - Restart
  • Enter - Confirm

Mouse:

  • Move - Aim Crosshair
  • Mouse 1 - Interact 1
  • Mouse 2 - Interact 2
